hero.name: Quentin Petiteville
hero.subtitle: Software Engineering Student
hero.p1: I am a 21-year-old student in my fifth year of engineering studies based in Lille, France.
hero.p2: I enjoy solving real-world problems and turning ideas into robust, reliable, and easily maintainable solutions, while continuously improving performance and quality.
hero.p3: Looking for new opportunities and projects, I’m seeking a six-month end-of-studies internship starting on March 4, 2026.

experience.title: Web Development Internship
experience.description: Redesign of the Music Story website, migrating WordPress content to Next.js/Tailwind CSS. Focused on improving website performance, maintainability, and user experience.

experience.title: Web Development Internship
experience.description: Worked on website design, developed algorithms, and cleaned databases. Contributed to real-world projects, improving web-based applications and interfaces.

education.title: Master's in Engineering Program (Big Data & Management)
education.description: Courses entirely in English with a major in Big Data and a minor in Management. Focus on Data Analysis, AI, and Software/Web Development.

education.title: Bachelor's Degree in Information and Communications Technology
education.institution: JAMK University of Applied Sciences, Jyväskylä, Finland
education.description: Specialization in Software Development, Data Analysis, and AI. Hands-on experience with advanced labs and real-world projects in an international ICT environment.
